EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-09-26-Denver Community Appreciation Event.ES-2017-09-25.EMAIL - Confirm
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Turbonomic Giants Game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I hope you are as excited as I am to hang out with the Turbonomic and Corus360 crew tomorrow evening at Coors Field as the Rockies take on the Marlins! I am reaching out to provide you with some final details to ensure you find your way to Suite 62B. I have your ticket, and from 5:10 p.m. until 6:10 p.m. I will wait in front of the Sandlot Brewery next to Gate B (located at the corner of Blake St and 22nd St.). I will be wearing a Turbonomic t-shirt so I'm easy to find, and will personally hand you your ticket. Then you are free to head up to Suite 62B! Please let me know if you cannot attend so that I may reallocate your ticker or if you cannot arrive by 6:10 p.m., I will leave your ticket at will call <[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]> Tuesday, September 26th 6:40pm <[[http://sanfrancisco.giants.mlb.com/sf/downloads/y2015/seating_streets.pdf]]>Where: Coors Field Maimi Marlins vs Colorado Rockies 2001 Blake St, Denver, CO 80205
Click here for additional park information <[[http://colorado.rockies.mlb.com/col/ballpark/]]>
If you have any issues day of I can be reached at 781-686-3634.
See you soon! Megan
Megan Gay Marketing Program Manager Turbonomic, Inc.
